title: Cincinnati Uses Lasers to Tackle Road Repairs
text:
09 Cincinnati Uses Lasers to Tackle Road Repairs 
Governing: When the American economy dove headfirst into the rocky shoals of the 2008 financial collapse, local governments across the country watched as their reserves hemorrhaged to fund basic daily operations. Things like regular road maintenance and retaining full staffing levels in vital departments became an almost impossible task for many.
